q1.question: Which of the following is not a main purpose of educational quality assurance?
options: To create satisfaction for the community and society.
To develop educational management based on the school’s context.
To allow supervisory agencies to acknowledge the performance results of schools under their jurisdiction.
To evaluate whether the school’s educational management passes or fails.

q2.question: Which of the following is not part of implementing an internal educational quality assurance system within a school?
options: The school sets its own educational standards without having to match every standard announced by the Ministry of Education.
Preparing a school development plan for a period of 3–5 years.
Appointing knowledgeable and competent individuals responsible for establishing the school’s quality assurance system.
Projects/activities listed in the annual operational plan can be adjusted as needed.
